strings.intro: \nA simple implementation of a documents provider using the storage access framework in Android 4.4.

metadata.description: This sample shows how to implement a simple documents provider using the storage access framework available in Android 4.4.
metadata.intro:
This sample uses the [StorageAccessFramework][1] introduced in Android 4.4 to implement a [DocumentsProvider][2].
See [Writing A Custom Document Provider guide][3] for all the details on how to do this.
[1]: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/providers/document-provider.html [2]: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/provider/DocumentsProvider.html [3]: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/providers/document-provider.html#custom
